apps.developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
comments: I saw this app & decided to try it. With other games, I immediately find numerous significant discrepancies: the avatars are nothing like the description/ad, nor is the game so I uninstall immediately. However, I've been playing from the start (like a drug addict) 🤣 - can't get enough! The avatars are beautiful, makeup, hair & clothes r fab & trendy, & just my style! I want them for real! Of course the fact that I've only lost 1 game out of approx 60+/- doesn't hurt! Your team is brilliant ty❤

For being a core android app, this app is complete garbage! I get network issues all the time, not because of my network that works for everything else, JUST this app. Some downloads freeze halfway, no matter how many times I restart, and other times I get a image of a sad satellite saying Try Again. I also have "auto update" turned on but every time I check there's like 20+ apps waiting to update. It's also just a bad, confusing interface. Come on Google, get your act together!!!

Oh my goodness, no words can describe how awesome and incredible this game is. First off, the detail on this game is beyond good, also the story line is so suspenseful and crazy good. The only issues about this game is probably the lack of ads. I just recommend the developers, or the people that made this game could please shorten the ads, cause it does get annoying, but other than that, it's amazing. Also, the fact that it's free is shocking to me, the point is I highly recommend this game! :)

Best Ever!!! Only thing I would change are the prices. Some games are great in the paid section, but most are either a waste of time or just glitch ridden and full of ads. Nobody wants to stop playing every 30 seconds to watch an ad for another game thats filled with issues as well! Other than that Google is the best place to find what u need and the correct information. Thanks google

I'm writing this review hoping to get your attention. This app is one of the core Android apps. It's very useful for saving my game progress and allowing me access to certain features on games this is exactly why I believe you should pay more attention to it. The app is very buggy(if that makes sense). I can't even get past the loading screen to use it and others have mentioned that other problems such as it randomly closing. I'd appreciate it if you could check on the app and work on this.
apps.name: Google Play Games

apps.recentChanges:
View charts, graphs, and presentations, right inside your Notion docs and tasks. Just paste a link from Pitch, Amplitude, GRID or Hex to create a link preview!
- Include Pitch decks right inside in your meeting notes
- Show up-to-date charts from Amplitude in product reviews
- Include interactive charts and calculators from GRID in your Notion docs
- Enable easy access to Hex charts and graphs across your company
comments: There aren't many tools that can beat Notion in terms of versatility and use for project management, but if you're looking for a more straightforward note-taking app, there are better alternatives out there. App performance has drastically improved since it was first released, but still a long way to go before it feels smooth on mobile. Biggest downside is the fact that everything is stored on the cloud and there isn't a true offline mode where your actual files are saved locally.

Really slow, almost unusable. I can't type fsster than 20 wpm, delete more than 10 words at a time, or change a few settings without the app crashing. The delay on typing can be almost 5 second longs (let that sink in; a delay of half a second is annoying). There's no offline mode, even though I don't use any online features. I checked and re-checked; no magic setting that fixes it. I'd give it 5 stars, if only it worked.

Edit: Tried Notion again, it's much better and usable now, but still noticeably slow compared to other apps. Cool features but painfully slow. It's the slowest when typing. If I a type a sentence or 2, it can easily get behind by a few words. When typing, it takes a second for the letter to actually appear on screen. The issue does not go way despite clearing cache and storage. I want to like this app, but it's pretty much unusable like this.

I think they need to stop with the new features and focus on making this app leaner. I'm counting close to 7 to 11 seconds before everything loads for a database. I'm just getting sick how sluggish this app feels. There have been some improvements in speed but it's still not enough. There are times where I just don't even bother using Notion because of the slow performance. And it's definitely not my phone! OneNote and Google keep load and 3 to 5 seconds tops!

I use the desktop version, which works great, but the android app seems really buggy. I start typing then the cursor jumps to random places on the page after a couple minutes of use. I'm afraid that I'll lose data or something if this keeps up. Please fix it so that I can also take notes on my phone without having to worry that I'll lose data!
apps.name: Notion

apps.title: Bose Connect
apps.description:
EASY ACCESS TO EVERYTHING
 Get quick access to the key features on your products, like the auto-off timer, volume control and battery readings. And it’s the easiest way to manage multiple Bluetooth connections. But that’s just the beginning.

SHARE THE MUSIC
MUSIC SHARE lets you listen together. Now two pairs of Bose® wireless headphones can share the experience - listen together, at the same time, while one of you DJ’s. New PARTY MODE lets you sync two SoundLink® speakers for double the audio…ideal for listening in two different places, and new STEREO MODE immerses you in music by separating the sound into Left and Right channels across two paired speakers for that amazing stereo experience.

GET THE MOST OUT OF YOUR HEADPHONES
CONTROLLABLE NOISE CANCELLATION on our QC®30 headphones lets you decide how much of the world to let in by adjusting the level of noise cancellation right in the app. And the built-in HEART RATE MONITOR for our SoundSport® Pulse headphones displays your heart rate clearly in the app.

AND SO MUCH MORE
From viewing product details to personalizing settings, get the most out of your Bose wireless products. It even downloads the latest software in the background and only installs it when you’re ready. See how our simple app can make all the difference.

* NOTE *
Bose Connect works with Bose Frames, QC®35, SoundSport® wireless, SoundSport® Pulse wireless, SoundSport® Free wireless, QuietControl™ 30, SoundLink® wireless II, ProFlight® headphones, and SoundWear Companion speaker, SoundLink® Color II, SoundLink® Revolve, SoundLink® Revolve+, SoundLink® Micro, and S1 Pro® speakers

comments: No longer works. It used to work fine to change the active noise level but after the 3/31/22 update it no longer sees my headset even though it works fine with my phone. I just want to change the level of noise reduction when using it for phone calls. It used to work fine. I've tried all the troubleshooting tips in the app and on the website. Seems like this should be the easiest part of designing a $350 headset

I use the Bose Connect App for my Bose Sport Earbuds. When I attempted to connect to them this evening, they weren't able to be seen by the app. I tried un-pairing and re-pairing. That didn't work. I noticed that the Bose Connect app (Google App) had been updated recently, so I decided to uninstall and reinstall the app so it would be a fresh copy of the most recent app. That definitely solved the issue. 👍

Worthless, invasive. Refuses to recognize my QuietComfort 35 II even though they're connected to the phone (and only the phone) and playing music just fine // EDIT connected after uninstalling and reinstalling // Most egregiously, it forces you to agree to sharing your location in order to use the app. and automatically opts you in to other data collection. Unbelievable. Will never buy another Bose product while these anti-consumer policies remain; a shame because the hardware is great.

Party mode is very buggy, it takes about 5 to 10 tries to connect 2 speakers, every single time. The app for some reason requires location access, but says it's only needed for the find my headphones feature. Makes no sense. I like Bose products but this is getting annoying, I can't ever have a peaceful listening experience anymore with Bose products, it's always a hassle now. I don't want to switch to JBL or another speaker brand, but it's getting to that point. I wish they could resolve this

I will not be purchasing Bose going forward. it's unfortunate that they decided to go this route of inconveniencing their customers and demanding they install an app and share their location just to use a speaker. The fact that you even have to install an app to connect the Bluetooth is ridiculous. My phone connects to other Bluetooth devices without having to install an app.
apps.name: Bose Connect

apps.title: Disney+
apps.description:
Disney+ is the streaming home of your favorite stories. With unlimited entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic, there's always something to explore. Watch the latest releases, Original series and movies, classic films, and TV shows with new stories added every week. 

When opening Disney+ for the first time on or after March 16, all subscribers in the U.S. will be prompted to update their Parental Controls. This includes the option to select content ratings restrictions for each profile as well as to add a PIN to lock profiles. Those that choose to keep their settings the same will continue to enjoy Disney+ as they always have within a TV-14 content rating environment, with the option to make changes at any time under Profile settings.

Stream and download Originals like Loki, and fan favorites like Frozen and The Simpsons.

With Disney+, you get:
• Exclusive new Originals from the creators of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic
• Access to new releases, timeless classics and past seasons of your favorite TV shows
• GroupWatch, a way to watch Disney+ together, even when you’re apart
• Unlimited downloads on up to 10 devices
• Over 100 titles in 4K UHD and HDR
• The capacity to watch on four screens at once at no extra cost
• IMAX Enhanced, see the full scale and scope with IMAX's expanded aspect ratio. Available with certain Marvel titles and accessible on all devices where Disney+ is supported. 
• Multiple parental control features including Profile PIN, Kids Profiles, Kid-Proof Exit. Account holders can change an individual profile’s content rating at any time under Profile settings. 

For help with Disney+, please visit: http://help.disneyplus.com.
For our Subscriber Agreement and other policies please visit: https://disneyplus.com/legal.

Your California Privacy Rights: https://www.disneyplus.com/legal/your-california-privacy-rights
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.disneyplus.com/legal/privacy-policy 

The content available on Disney+ may vary by region. Some titles shown above may not be available in your country.

United States
apps.recentChanges: Disney+ now has even more content on our never-ending quest to create and share the best stories from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic. We will continue to be a place for you to feel something with every story, whatever your mood, wherever you might be.
comments: Could not be worse. Don't get me wrong, the shows are great, but it doesn't matter if you only ever get an infinite loading screen and never reach login. When it used to work, it suffered from major buffer issues. Until they fix this app, there is no point in downloading it. Not to mention, it uses a lot of trackers like Braze to grab your personal data. Examples include GPS coordinates, last name, email address, and device model. If you've access to an alternative, I highly recommend using it.

i have no idea why, but any time i try to watch something on my phone, i just get a black screen. i can hear perfectly fine, the audio is crystal clear, but the screen remains blank throughout the entire duration of my selected video. i've restarted my phone, undownloaded and re-download the app many times, nothing seems to help. this is super unfortunate as disney is usually my first choice streaming platform. would really love this problem fixed.

Great app with amazing original content, when it decides to work right. 4 different devices tried, none work. Edit: It has been years now and it still will not work on any mobile devices regardless of permissions granted or even when anything is downloaded. Playback is just a black screen or a neverending loading symbol. The price is too high for the quality of technical support from Disney.

Great app. However, Disney, you need to create a screen between your home screen and playing a movie. Like a title screen asking if you want to resume the movie or restart from the beginning. It becomes incredibly frustrating rewinding a movie, especially on the TV. Every other streaming service has the title screen I'm talking about. In case you need examples 🙄

The Disney+ app is by far the worst streaming app I've used. Downloads work maybe 10% of the time. Either the download gets stuck and all future downloads fail unless you uninstall the app and reinstall, or after downloading, the video refuses to playback. When you're out on a road trip with screaming kids, this app is not your friend. Stick with Netflix.
apps.name: Disney+

apps.title: My Little Universe
apps.description:
🌖  MY LITTLE UNIVERSE – WANT TO PLAY GOD?  

Get lost in your own little universe 👨‍🚀

Creating a world isn’t easy, but it’s certainly a whole load of fun, as you’ll find out in this exciting casual worldbuilding adventure game. It takes ⛏️ mining, crafting, logging, digging, smelting, construction and a little gardening to make the perfect planet, and you’ll have to do all that while fighting off primeval monsters 🐙 intent on bringing an end to your divine plan. 

Armed with just a pickaxe and the almighty strength of your arms, get down to doing a god’s work and build a world of wonder in this addictive, original action game that will keep you creating for way more than seven days.

YOU’VE GOT THE WHOLE WORLD IN YOUR HANDS! 🪐

🚀 In the beginning there was a little orange man in a rocket ship, and in the end there’ll be a whole glorious planet built with just those tiny orange hands. Get mining, amass 15 different types of resources and spend them with infinite wisdom to create a beautiful planetary paradise that can bask in your divine benevolence.

🚀 Thor has his hammer, Neptune has his trident, and in this game you have a mighty pickaxe that’s just as adept at fighting off monsters as it is at breaking rocks, digging for minerals and mining for gold. Upgrade it through eight different levels to improve your divine productivity, and harvest even more resources to keep on building.

🚀 As civilization develops under your watchful eye, you’ll have the chance to set up industrial facilities to smelt metal, process minerals and make a further eight types of weapon that will help you in your divine crafts, including an ax with eight different levels of improvement and the unique Excalibur sword to strike the fear of god into your monstrous opponents.

🚀 Expand and diversify with 10 different types of in-game environment to build, explore and exploit as you move in mysterious ways to create your true planetary paradise. But watch out for monsters – 8 kinds of enemy including abominable snowmen, unfriendly ents, and alien fungal foes are all out to stop your godly intentions.

🚀 Simple but attractive graphics and a rich soundscape add to the appeal of this simple but absorbing genre-crossing mining game where you write your own creation myth.

 IN ACTION HOW LIKE AN ANGEL, IN APPREHENSION HOW LIKE A GOD!  ☄️
Have you of late lost all your mirth? Well, you’ll find mirth aplenty, along with hours of action and adventure, in My Little Universe. Take a sterile promontory and turn it into a beautiful, blooming planet that would make any god proud to be its master. Dig, chop, craft, smash, mine and fight your way to divine grace and a little universe all of your own. 

Download My Little Universe now and get down to a god’s work!

apps.developerAddress: 8010, Cyprus, Paphos, Tepeleniou 13, Tepelenio Court, 2nd floor
apps.recentChanges:
- Improved level loading times on various devices
- Improved performance of the game on low end devices
- Added language selection to settings screen
- Added graphics selection to settings screen
- Refactored systems and UI functionality
- Added damage indicators above player & enemy hitpoint bar
- Fixed issue with Arenas not properly resetting
- Fixed issue with Dimidium refineries not working for some players
comments: I enjoy this game. Great time waster but two problems. 1: Everytime I collect resources and after I use them to unlock a new part of the map an ad pops up (every time). 2: Everytime I close the app to take a break and try to log back in it gets to the loading screen and closes on me. It takes me 5+ tries just to try and get into the game without it closing on me.

Despite using a Google account to sign in, the game reset itself somehow. My character has all the armor upgrades but the entire world reset to the couple tiles. Disappointing. It was a fun game. (And I paid money to get rid of ads). I'll keep it for a little while to see if it is a bug that'll reset back to normal. But will definitely be deleting if it doesn't resolve itself. The game itself was fun.

Enjoyed the game so much I completed it. Well I got as far as there was to go.. But it was awhile ago when there wasn't a way to sign in with Google. Got a new phone and lost my game in the process. Those that are upset about the ads... Using the ads to your benefit to get those lump sum of certain items you need will definitely benefit you in the end.Upgrading all 3 weapons at least 10 times each is the only way to move forward. So use those ads or chop,chop,chop for much longer of a time.

I have played a lot of mobile games but this one, by far, has the most ad interruptions that most cannot be skipped. I didn't trust some of the other reviews but now I'm a believer. The ads constantly interrupting the game makes it unplayable. Somewhat fun between the ads so 2 stars. I do recommend the developers to rename the game "My Ad Universe"

I like this game overall... but there is no point to it. Just collect resources. Unlock areas on the map. Upgrade your equipment. Repeat. Repeat. It becomes very tedious once you get to the end of the second planet. If I get to the third planet and there are no automated resource collection options... I'll probably loose interest really fast.
apps.name: My Universe

apps.title: Vuzix Companion
apps.description:
The Vuzix Companion app allows you to manage your Vuzix smart glasses right from your smartphone!

The following Vuzix products are supported:

• Vuzix Blade® AR Smart Glasses
• Vuzix Blade® Smart Glasses - Safety Certified
• M400 Smart Glasses
• M4000 Smart Glasses
• M300XL Smart Glasses
• M300 Smart Glasses

With this application and a pair of Vuzix smart glasses you can do the following:

• Download and configure applications for use on your smart glasses (Vuzix Blade only)
• Configure settings for your smart glasses
• Manage notifications from your phone to show on your smart glasses (Vuzix Blade only)
• Manage pictures and videos taken on your smart glasses (Vuzix Blade only)
• Remotely control applications on your smart glasses using the virtual trackpad
• Remotely send keyboard input from your phone to your smart glasses

Don't have smart glasses? Buy a pair today: https://www.vuzix.com/products

apps.recentChanges:
* Easier to find Manage Storage Tab
* QR Generator tab
* Companion can receive data from participating apps on smart glasses
* WiFi setup available when linking
* Miscellaneous bugs and improvements
comments: Vuzix had fixed the notification syncing issues that I had in the past. Using my Vuzix Blade, enabling Google Maps on their notifications and showing the directions on the Blade makes navigation a much safer driving experience. I wish there are more 3rd party apps for it. I recommend restarting the phone if the Vuzix Blade is disconnected from the phone.

App support non existant expensive for non working apps. Discord is there cool cant login because google isnt supported. Okay let's try any other app. Not google earth same issue and google translate wont let me scroll down to set it up. Also theres no scroll down so sometimes you get apps that are built for this screen but you cant select or scroll to select anything in them. Oh I guess all I can really do is read my text which my watch does better and watch netflix or amazon prime with one eye.

We have a beta pair currently developing our app! We did get to download the app and run a few tests. So far no apps pop up in the store on search and notifications aren't working. **just noticed an update, so maybe a fix?**

I'm pissed i bought such a expensive glasses that i can only take photos and record and the quality is horrible. Vuzix jumped out there to beat odg r8 and r9 the battery also suck it only has potential. I mean it doesn't have at least 3 good apps out the box it does none of what was advertised
Not sure what was done in the latest update but it works much better with Vuzix Blade. Notifications are showing up properly and the app is not freezing up! Android 10 OnePlus 7 Pro
apps.name: Vuzix Companion

apps.title: UISP Mobile (UNMS)
apps.description:
The UISP app gives users a single-point device installation and management tool for Ubiquiti’s extensive line of ISP-grade products. With the app, you will be able to:

*Integrate your ISP devices into the UISP controller.
*Quickly and easily setup ISP devices and align links with bluetooth or a dedicated management radio.
*Manage and monitor every aspect of your ISP network from a single app.
apps.descriptionHTML:
The UISP app gives users a single-point device installation and management tool for Ubiquiti’s extensive line of ISP-grade products. With the app, you will be able to:

*Integrate your ISP devices into the UISP controller.
*Quickly and easily setup ISP devices and align links with bluetooth or a dedicated management radio.
*Manage and monitor every aspect of your ISP network from a single app.
apps.summary: UISP Mobile is a convenient client for installing Ubiquiti devices
apps.recentChanges:
*improve UISP routers wizard
*improve SSO login
*fix setting VLANs on switch devices
*UI and stability fixes
comments: This app takes longer than setting a static IP on a laptop and directly connecting it to the device that needs to be configured. It found my device twice, but couldn't do anything with it. Most of the time it doesn't find it at all. The app gives a list of devices to search but the list doesn't do anything, so manually selecting the device does nothing. Not sure what this app is actually for other than wasting time.

I wish this app was advanced as UniFi. Right now I have to bounce back and fourth between both apps because I use a EdgeRouter 4 with a EdgeSwitch 8 and run 2 AP Pros and the APs have to be on the UniFi to control unless I'm missing something. But that being said..... the UniFi experience is leaps and bounds over the the UNMS experience. UNMS is still a great way to customize most controls. The only thing I am not able to do is port management on my switch. All in all, great app.

App update deleted all my backups and no longer shows Lan connection speed, which is useful for trouble shooting radios. Also removed frequency scan list, so now you're forced to scan all frequencies when looking for an access point. You can no longer manually change the output power, it's either auto or max.

After realizing how much the app leaves inaccessible in contrast to the web ui, it gets a 1 Star. I've said it before, I'm saying it now and I'll say it again; the app should be able to do EVERYTHING that the web ui can do PERIOD... It was a confusing mess but I finally got my PtP bridge setup. I'm not entirely sure how, as the app didn't really make things easy, but it also could have been much worse.
Nothing works, errors anytime it tries to connect. Setting up aircube leaves the app frozen and must force quit. Keeps telling me I need to connect to my UISP, which is already connected.
apps.name: UISP

apps.title: Snapchat
apps.description:
Snapchat is a fast and fun way to share the moment with your friends and family 👻

SNAP 
• Snapchat opens right to the Camera — just tap to take a photo, or press and hold for video.
• Express yourself with Lenses, Filters, Bitmoji and more! 
• Try out new Lenses daily created by the Snapchat community!

CHAT 
• Stay in touch with friends through live messaging, or share your day with Group Stories.
• Video Chat with up to 16 friends at once — you can even use Lenses and Filters when chatting!
• Express yourself with Friendmojis — exclusive Bitmoji made just for you and a friend.

STORIES
• Watch friends' Stories to see their day unfold.
• See Stories from the Snapchat community that are based on your interests.
• Discover breaking news and exclusive Original Shows.

SPOTLIGHT
• Spotlight showcases the best of Snapchat!
• Submit your own Snaps or sit back, relax, and watch.
• Pick your favorites and share them with friends.

MAP 
• Share your location with your best friends or go off the grid with Ghost Mode.
• See what your friends are up to on your most personal map when they share their location with you. 
• Explore live Stories from the community nearby or across the world!

MEMORIES 
• Save unlimited photos and videos of all your favorite moments.
• Edit and send old moments to friends or save them to your Camera Roll.
• Create Stories from your favorite Memories to share with friends and family.

FRIENDSHIP PROFILE 
• Every friendship has its own special profile to see the moments you’ve saved together.
• Discover new things you have in common with Charms — see how long you’ve been friends, your astrological compatibility, your Bitmoji fashion sense, and more!
• Friendship Profiles are just between you and a friend, so you can bond over what makes your friendship special.

Happy Snapping!

• • •

Please note: Snapchatters can always capture or save your messages by taking a screenshot, using a camera, or otherwise. Be mindful of what you Snap!

For a full description of our privacy practices, please see our Privacy Center.

apps.developerAddress:
63 Market St.
Venice CA, 90291
apps.recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements! 👻
comments: I love snapchat, I've had it and loved it for years. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because I've been having issues with the filters working, and when looking through saved memories, I hit save one time and there are multiples of many, copies of my videos are shorter, some are split up into 2 or 3 videos. The split videos when I select one video to delete (bc it's a multiple) it selects both/all that would have made the original video. One one video, the text I had made small is big.

App is quite confusing. I expected it to be much more user friendly & to be easily navigated through. I can never seem to get to the option I want to. There is no real option to get help or assistance. Once I get to another screen it never lets me go back. I don't like the constant change of filters many being unattractive especially when I've seen great ones. When I opened my account I was unaware I could never change my username. I couldn't think of what I wanted at the moment.

I don't know what happened in the last update, but taking snaps now all of a sudden will either shift the text over to outside the screen area, so no one can read the text. Not only this, but the cameras will occasionally zoom in all the way and I'll have to reset the app to fix it. Another thing I just experienced was the camera was completely distorted as if there was a drunk filter over it. You guys messed up this update, because it was perfect before.

For the past week I have not been able to record snaps, it stops as soon as I hold the button down. I also cannot send audio clips. For about two days I was unable to send bitmojis as well. I've tried to report the problem within the app but have not gotten any response back or even acknowledgement the report was received. I've tried turning my phone off and back on and even uninstalling and reinstalling the app, without luck.

This app has really evolved over the years and still kept its base purpose. This is my go-to social app with friends. It's very convenient to share pictures. Some complaints: I don't like the new feature to drag text down to delete the whole thing. I often delete mine unintentionally while positioning it. I think this needs to be reworked but has a good intention. Dark mode has now been a standard for years yet it is not available for this app. I don't understand what's taking so long.
apps.name: Snapchat

apps.title: Control Blackmagic Camera
apps.description:
IMPORTANT:
1. IN FIRMWARE 6.9.5v, THE BLUETOOTH API IS NOT RESPONDING TO INPUTS BY THE APP. WE HAVE CONTACTED BMD REGARDING THE ISSUE. KINDLY USE THE APP WITH 6.9.4v.

2. FOCUS CONTROL FOR BMD CAMERAS WITH EF MOUNTS (EG. BMPC 6K) IS PENDING FROM OUR END BECAUSE WE DO NOT HAVE THE CAMERA RIGHT NOW AND IT IS DIFFICULT TO RENT DURING THE PANDEMIC.

Control Blackmagic Camera app allows you to seamlessly control your Blackmagic  camera, including fast access to recording, setting up exposure, white balance, lens focus and more.

Supported Cameras: BMPCC 4K/6K, Ursa Mini, Ursa Min Pro

Features include:
- Start/Stop Recording
- Choose Recording codec/formats - ProRes and BRAW
- Choose Resolution, Frame-rate, Dynamic Range, Detail Sharpening (in ProRes)
- Manage Iris, Shutter and ISO and Auto Exposure (if your lens supports)
- Manage White Balance and Tint
- Lens Control - Focus and Zoom (if your lens supports)
- Play last clip
- Manage Camera LCD Frame Guides
- Manage Clip/Slate + Project and Lens Information

Exciting Features:
- Rack Focus
- Shutter Angle/Speed suggestions for selected FPS
- Single Click to toggle special off speed - 60/75/100/120
- Mobile Rotation
- Slate Mode - only Slate settings editable 
- Customizable Minibar to view and speed click to a particular Setting
- Topbar indicators if enabled in camera - Off Speed, Timelapse, Windowed Mode

Requirements:
Minimum Firmware version 6.2
Bluetooth Enabled on Camera
Bluetooth Enabled on Android Mobile
Location Enabled on Android Mobile

How to use:
- Open the App - Pair your Camera - There you go

Tested only on:
– Blackmagic Pocket 4K camera

Important: 
- We are not affiliated with Blackmagic Design Pty Ltd.
- We love Blackmagic Design for their inclusive approach to enhance experience of their awesome products
- BMPCC4K Camera is a trademark product of Blackmagic Design Pty Ltd.

Privacy:
This App does NOT access, store nor transmit any personal information
This App does NOT make use of any advertisement frameworks nor user trackers

- Choose Resolution, Frame-rate, Dynamic Range, Detail Sharpening (in ProRes)
- Manage Iris, Shutter and ISO and Auto Exposure (if your lens supports)
- Manage White Balance and Tint
- Lens Control - Focus and Zoom (if your lens supports)
- Play last clip
- Manage Camera LCD Frame Guides
- Manage Clip/Slate + Project and Lens Information

Exciting Features:
- Rack Focus
- Shutter Angle/Speed suggestions for selected FPS
- Single Click to toggle special off speed - 60/75/100/120
- Mobile Rotation
- Slate Mode - only Slate settings editable
- Customizable Minibar to view and speed click to a particular Setting
- Topbar indicators if enabled in camera - Off Speed, Timelapse, Windowed Mode

Requirements:
Minimum Firmware version 6.2
Bluetooth Enabled on Camera
Bluetooth Enabled on Android Mobile
Location Enabled on Android Mobile

How to use:
- Open the App - Pair your Camera - There you go

Tested only on:
– Blackmagic Pocket 4K camera

Important:
- We are not affiliated with Blackmagic Design Pty Ltd.
- We love Blackmagic Design for their inclusive approach to enhance experience of their awesome products
- BMPCC4K Camera is a trademark product of Blackmagic Design Pty Ltd.

Privacy:
This App does NOT access, store nor transmit any personal information
This App does NOT make use of any advertisement frameworks nor user trackers

comments: love this app, makes working with the bmpcc 4k on your own incredibly intuitive and easy! I did run into one particular use case that i don't see any settings for in the app, and uncertain if they can be implemented: Realized after racking up the camera and getting ready to record that i did not have the proper audio inputs selected for recording. there are no settings to set this in the app! i'll have to unrack and use the built in monitor to change and re set up the camera. Other than that, great stuff, and works flawlessly. I wonder if that setting can be implemented in the future? thanks for this app!

Nice app, but the length of the focus slider is far too short to reliably achieve accurate focus. Even on a 10" tablet with the slider scale set to 2x. I *strongly* and respectfully suggest the addition of a mode in which the zoom and focus sliders occupy the entire height of the screen. In all other respects, this is the best app I've tried for the BMPCC 4k (and I believe I have them all). But the inexplicable decision to limit the size of the focus slider makes every app virtually useless for my work. Increase the size of the focus slider to the maximum height allowed by any particular device, and it's five stars all the way.

Really great app! Needs an update to have all of the correct labels for the Blackmagic 6K, but I love the functionality!! You can change any setting and even run/stop the camera from your phone! That feature alone is one I've wanted for a long time. This will be great for my focus pullers to use so I don't have to worry about certain settings when operating the camera! The layout is nice and simple. It also connects in seconds which is invaluable. Very well done app.

Amazing app. Controls so much on the bmpcc. Still no ef focus or zoom and based on the last update date this is probably an abandoned app which is unfortunate. It does work very well. It connects right away and doesnt need to be paired once you first pair. Much easier than contorting to use the on-cam screen. Love it! (Not sure why I have a 2nd review. App still doesnt recognize my 6k as a 6k so that's weird. Knocking a couple stars for that and the abandonment issue.)

Really like this App. I wish it had more rack focus points to set. That would be huge. I use this App together with my Edelkrone HeadPlus and slider which is also controlled by Bluetooth. Something that Edelkrone does well is let you set points and then take a photo to have a visual representation of what the next point jumps to. This could be a UI enhancement. In a perfect world I could use this App to control the BMPC4K focus and the Edelkrone movements at the same time. One can dream :)
apps.name: Control Blackmagic Camera

apps.title: Gboard - the Google Keyboard
apps.description:
Gboard has everything you love about Google Keyboard—speed and reliability, Glide Typing, voice typing, Handwriting, and more

Glide Typing — Type faster by sliding your finger from letter to letter

Voice typing — Easily dictate text on the go

Handwriting* — Write in cursive and printed letters

Emoji Search* — Find that emoji, faster

GIFs* — Search and share GIFs for the perfect reaction.

Multilingual typing — No more switching between languages manually. Gboard will autocorrect and suggest from any of your enabled languages.

Google Translate — Translate as you type in the keyboard

* Not supported on Android Go devices
Hundreds of language varieties, including:
Afrikaans, Amharic, Arabic, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bavarian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Burmese, Cebuano, Chhattisgarhi, Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, and others), Chittagonian, Czech, Deccan, Dutch, English, Filipino, French, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hausa, Hindi, Igbo, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Khmer, Korean, Kurdish, Magahi, Maithili, Malay, Malayalam, Marathi, Nepali, Northern Sotho, Odia, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Saraiki, Sindhi, Sinhala, Somali, Southern Sotho, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Tswana, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu, and many more! Visit https://goo.gl/fMQ85U for the full list of languages supported

Wear OS support: Everything you love about the Google Keyboard now available on your watch—speed and reliability, Glide Typing, Voice Typing, and more

Glide Typing — Type faster by sliding your finger from letter to letter

Voice Typing — Easily dictate text on the go

Emoji Typing — Find your favorite emojis on your wrist

All Wear OS languages supported, including:
Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, and others), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, and many more!

Pro tips:
• Gesture cursor control: Slide your finger across the space bar to move the cursor
• Gesture delete: Slide left from the delete key to quickly delete multiple words
• Make the number row always available (enable in Settings → Preferences → Number Row)
• Symbols hints: Show quick hints on your keys to access symbols with a long press (enable in Settings → Preferences → Long press for symbols)
• One handed mode: On large screen phones, pin keyboard to the left or the right of the screen
• Themes: Choose your own theme, with or without key borders

comments: I've been using Gboard for almost as long as I've used Android devices. I never had a problem up until now. All of a sudden in the last week or so, the cursor will jump to random places in whatever I'm typing, throw predictive text wherever the cursor lands, backspace in the middle of words, etc. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the keyboard, but it worked even worse somehow. If I could give 0/5, I would. It's pretty unusable. Stuck defaulting to the Samsung keyboard.

I can't back up and correct anything. The curser jumps to the end of the sentence when trying to backspace or insert text. When it does go to the end of the sentence and I to click on backspace, it doubles the letters in the word the cursor is next to. I can no longer highlight a word and click on the capitalize/shift option. Please fix. Until such time, I'll have to go back to the stock keyboard. This is NOT a phone issue. It's happening with so many others' regardless of point manufacturer.

*EDIT* *The issue was apparently on Facebook. Changed to 5 star.* I've been using GBoard for years. There now seems to be an insurmountable issue causing it to be completely unusable. Cursor goes wherever it wants while you're trying to type. Cannot edit any text from previous words as it will force the cursor all the way to the end of the sentence as soon as you type or delete. It adds letters while you're trying to delete words at the end after.

After recent updates, it is now almost impossible to edit text that is in the middle without the cursor jumping to where you are not typing. It is very frustrating to backspace all the way back to the spot that needs edited instead of just being able to touch the word and edit it. Whatever was changed on this update needs to be reversed as it is badly flawed.

A glitch! The keyboard is mostly useless because when I try to correct something,the cursor will jump to a random place and add a few letters at random. The only way I can correct this is to start over by deleting my text and slowly type with one finger. I see others have this problem. Plus, I notice the clipboard is gone. Ugh...
apps.name: Gboard

apps.title: Quick Measure
apps.description:
Quick Measure provide the AR Measurement experiences quickly and easily using Camera and AR Technology.

 Devices equipped with DepthVision Camera provide the following functions.
 - Distance Measurement : Measure the distance between the camera and the aiming point
 - Area Measurement : Measure length, width and area of square-shaped plane when rectangular shape has been aimed, and it measures radius and area of circular plane when circular shape has been aimed.
 - 3D Measurement : Measure the longest axis of each length, width, and height of 3D object
 - Length Measurement : Measure the length between two manually specified points.
 - Human Height Measurement : Measure the height of human from the foot to the head of the upper body 

 Devices without DepthVision Camera provide only the following functions. Please note that 3D measurement are not provided. 
 - Distance Measurement : Measure the distance between the camera and the aiming point
 - Area Measurement : Measure length, width and area of square-shaped plane when rectangular shape has been aimed, and it measures radius and area of circular plane when circular shape has been aimed.
 - Length Measurement : Measure the length between two manually specified points.
 - Human Height Measurement : Measure the height of human from the foot to the head of the upper body 
 For information whether the DepthVision Camera equipped or not, please refer to the manual or the samsung.com web page(https://samsung.com/sec/smartphones/) and check the camera hardware information of the device. 

 *To provide the app services, the following permissions are required.
 Optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed

 [Required permissions]
 - Camera : Used to receive information about object to be measured.
 - Storage : Used to store measurement information shooted.

 [Optional permissions]
 - None

apps.recentChanges: Fixed errors
comments: when the app works it's great, however when launched and the "scan the area around you" prompt will not go away. I'm tried pressing all over the screen, changing light settings etc and it stays on. On occasion it'll go away and then i can use the app as intended. Please add an "ok" button or just remove the prompt after the first time opening it. Otherwise it's useless since it cannot be used. If there's a way to remove the prompt please let me know.

To the programers:definitely has some kinks & bugs that need to be worked out. When app works, I've only been successful once & w/ nothing I was actually trying to measure, is pretty cool but 1/5 times is horrible odds. Note10+ when app is launched all it does is displays a tutorial which indicates (demonstrates what the user should do to obtain a measurement) to scan area but nothing more. The app also just closes out. If it worked it wld be a handy app especially when eyeballing wont cut it

Works way better that I was expecting. Measured my 15.6" laptop screen from 4 feet away as being 15.5". Results definitely very on the surface being measured however that more of a issue with TOF not the app. Make sure your are in a well lit area and avoid black of reflective surfaces like the app tells you and you shouldn't have any issues.

Not an app one would imagine is very useful but when you're trying to measure for new furniture it's perfect! Some are worried about access to camera and photo gallery. If it doesn't have access to this it can't use the camera to measure and it can't take an image of the measurement. Some people are so dumb. lol

Abysmal. Don't even try to use this, it just ends in frustration. It's like Samsung took all the worst ways to approximate distance and combined them into one sub quality app. Expect to constantly see the words "couldn't detect distance" regardless of your environment.
apps.name: Quick measure
